content: Can a system only upgrade the RESTful API to R4 but continue to use resources from R3? Pls advise, thanks.
depends on what you mean by RESTful API I guess. The RESTful URL include the resource name - so if a name changed between R4 and STU3 you cannot do that
if you want to use a header that is defined for R4 with STU3 resource you surely can
but STU3 clients would not use / understand it
it's not clear what you mean by that. R4 search parameters on R3 resources? An R4 capability statement describing R3 functionality?
thanks Michele, you did answer my question
